mapper.select: SELECT production_amount AS productionAmount FROM machine_history WHERE production_date BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 13 DAY) AND CURDATE() AND machine_id = #{machineId} ORDER BY production_date;

SELECT history_id as historyId, machine_id as machineId, production_amount as productionAmount, defective_amount as defectiveAmount, production_date as productionDate, production_date_update as productionDateUpdate FROM machine_history WHERE DATE(production_date) = CURDATE();
